lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference through those who want the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people talk with each other

lender.name: cam
lender.loan_because: I loan because I really want to make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every day and learn how to do new things

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: loans have helped me.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I respect the efforts of hard working people and want to help them in their pursuits.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children, ages 3 to 5 years; some have disabilities.

lender.name: Daniel Brandon
lender.loan_because: I want to help fund entrepreneurs world wide.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others succeed in business.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am honored to have the opportunity to so easily help someone who is working hard to better their lives and the lives of those around them. Why would I hoard my money when someone else needs it, and can put it to so much better use than my back account?

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I have no good reason not to!

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to make a specific, tangible difference in someone's life. I was born dirt poor, and would not be where I am now without the help of others when I was less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I write fiction books.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I have it and they need it.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it's just a really good idea. Helping "neighbours" who want to work to become economically sound makes my life better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics and computer courses.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: we're all in this life together.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and all indications are that this works.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the City Council and help them make decisions on the City's budget and policy.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: A housefire made me realize how much I had and how little I really needed - and Kiva shows me how I can so easily help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a college bookstore company.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate in the world, and those who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I track, budget, and analyze sales revenue and expenses for a $30 million insecticide business.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Compared to how the rest of the world lives I am RICH. We have a two-person, no-kid (but lots of rescued cats) household so I spend a lot of my "disposable income" on charities, primarily animal welfare. This is my first foray into social causes.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it is important to help people help themselves. One never knows what impact a simple gesture of good will may have in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I provide anesthesia for patients who need surgery and pain relief for women in labor. I love my work because it involves compassionate care of people at a time when they are stressed. I find the scientific basis of what I do very interesting and enjoy the technical challenges.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I can, should, and must. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates computer-based training, mostly for the U.S. government.

lender.name: Mary C.
lender.loan_because: It is important to support people in developing nations who are trying the help themselves and ultimately their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach social science and business courses to students who attend university online.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do. We waste so much money, not realising that that money could help a whole community.
lender.occupational_info: I run training courses to help women feel better about themselves. I teach about self confidence, feeling good, being happy and living a good life.

lender.name: Terrance
lender.occupational_info: I can't cause I don't.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I had money in my savings account.

lender.name: Xeon
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others around the world.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: a loan might help someone else do good for yet other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a poet, a musician, and a university teacher.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling that comes from knowing that I can make a difference in someone's life. I think encouraging more entrepreneurship is the way to go.
lender.occupational_info: Providing financial advice to small businesses.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Even taking the smallest step will change the world, if we all work together.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business consulting firm that works with businesses to develop renewable energy systems and government agencies and the private sector to develop energy efficiency programs and training.

lender.name: Jon
lender.occupational_info: Computer Programmer

lender.name: Family
lender.loan_because: the world has given so much to me.

lender.name: Donald and Monnica
lender.occupational_info: College Professor and daughter team

lender.name: David Podger
lender.occupational_info: I help good people find good jobs, & good employers hire good employees.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I have so much...

lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Linda

lender.occupational_info: I work as a sales exeutive for a non-profit - "Digital Divide Data" that provides jobs and education for disadvantaged and disabled young people in Cambodia and Laos.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way!
lender.occupational_info: Naturopathic Medicine

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: Because free charity to people that can work only perpetuates poverty thinking

lender.name: Kasey
lender.loan_because: My aunt and uncle actually gave me a gift card for this, I thought it was an awesome idea and it feels great to know you are impacting someone's life! Let's keep it up!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in highschool

lender.name: Andrew Johnson
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.loan_because: when you make money you have to learn to give it back too.
lender.occupational_info: hardwork results to resolution of any kind of problem

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Life is unfair, and I am a beneficiary of this unfairness. Kiva is an easy way to redress a very, very small bit of this inequity.

lender.name: Adriatic Granite
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you do good you'll get good, as simple as that.

lender.name: Matti
lender.loan_because: I want to make an effort and spread the good.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see people succeed in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school science.

lender.name: Nathan & Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to be a blessing and I want people to have an opportunity to be able to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a church making advertisements; videos, print material, websites and live productions. My wife is a nurse's assistant and works with elderly people.

lender.name: Pragathi mahila
lender.loan_because: We are giving training programs for different ages woma.we need some materian so we need loan
lender.occupational_info: our trainings give to stand their life.

lender.name: Trimbitas Sorin
lender.loan_because: I like helping others. I hope that all the people from kiva to which we all loan will get their dreams up&running.
lender.occupational_info: writing web applications and doing websites.

lender.name: Simon Manikkam
lender.loan_because: I make more Money that I need so id like to see the extra go to someone that needs it more that i do.
lender.occupational_info: Sound Video Lighting

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I was a Vietnam War Combat Infantryman and I've seen what people in 3rd world countries face. Kiva gives me a sense of well being and somehow helps me deal with the past from the war. I was in the Chu Lai, Vietnam area in 1968-69.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired machinery repair supervisor. I worked in the chemical industry for 34 years.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
We all have the potential to create the lifestyle we desire, but for some of us the lack of funds and support infrastructure is too big a challenge to overcome without help from those who can.
I can and I am grateful for the opportunity to provide assistance for ambitious people with those challenges to take action to create a better lifestyle for themselves and their families.
They are the people who help change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I inspire people to strike a balance between following your heart and gaining clarity to take action to create the life of their dreams using music to convey my message.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: i want to help women to be independent.
lender.occupational_info: i develop system applications for the financial sector.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: Its one of the most reasonable and effective ways to better the world.
lender.occupational_info: I dont work right now, but I attend school. My previous job was tutoring, which is helping younger students learn their material better.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I believe that if everyone in the world gave just a little bit, we could make a difference for our future and the futures of our children and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people new things to help them get even better at their jobs.

lender.name: Family Lindqvist
lender.loan_because: I believe in people!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to support other people.

lender.name: WeiMin
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to heal the downward spiral of poverty through self-help.
lender.occupational_info: To help the least, the last and the lost.

lender.name: dangerous
lender.loan_because: increase my positiveness
lender.occupational_info: Nothing

lender.name: Debra and Chris
lender.loan_because: I just learned about this micro loan idea and think it is wonderful. It's not a hand out, it's a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I have owned a family restaurant with my parents for 30 years.

lender.name: miguel
lender.loan_because: i like to help people if i can

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I help terminally ill people to live as well as they can until they die

lender.name: Chip Hayner
lender.loan_because: As a part of the wealthiest 1% in the world, I feel that it is our responsibility to help those out who could greatly benefit from our financial help. What might mean a nice lunch for me, could mean the difference between a failing and thriving business for them.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for plans, designs, and develops websites for other companies, schools, and non-profit organizations. Our goal is to help these organizations to maximize their potential through the use of the internet.

lender.name: Gope Earthling
lender.occupational_info: WORK with the philosophy of Connecting with Souls attracting Similar thoughts, for mutual benefits & connect Life / World best.

lender.name: Tapio
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans is better option than development aid for helping people. Helping small businesses is good step for better world

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me.

lender.name: Jev
lender.loan_because: I want to help and I can do it.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea helping out those that really want to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work day to day with computers and helping computer users.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help in a more personal way.
lender.occupational_info: I make medicine.

lender.name: Markus
lender.occupational_info: I do web research.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit's innate desire to succeed and build a better life for oneself. Given the opportunity to succeed sometimes requires a little help and faith from others- I hope I can contribute to the quality of life for those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I sell biological tissue in the Operating Room so that General and Plastic Surgeons can repair complex abdominal wall defects and do breast reconstruction after a mastectomy.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because:
it's one way of helping others to help themselves - in a way which empowers and gives dignity.
It's too simple not to.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: We believe gaining financial indepence is enduring and far reaching.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I want people to be free to pursue their dreams, and experience the freedom, empowerment, confidence, opportunity, and sense of well-being that owning a successful business can bring. :)

lender.name: Inge
lender.occupational_info: I am a coordinator in a school for children with special needs.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I believe you help people out by helping them up
lender.occupational_info: I run a factory that produces product used in the confectionary industry

lender.name: octavio
lender.loan_because: There is no way of making a better world than to give someone the opportunity to improve their chances in life.
lender.occupational_info: Education Consulting. Helping kids stay in school through coaching.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Its a great system
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare Research

lender.name: kyle
lender.loan_because: like Wilford Brimley would say, it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Other people can use these small amounts of money more than me. I like the idea of people working for what they earn, and if they need help, I'm happy to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I take in grass seed orders, and choose what varieties of seed to go into the mixtures.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: It is nice to know that I can make a difference, a little at a time!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I like being able to directly help people around the world. I donate to local groups in my local community and I think it is also important to try and help people globally.
lender.occupational_info: We sell online advertising to automotive clients for our automotive web site.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in individual freedom.
lender.occupational_info: Local education reform work.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I CAN be a difference in the world!!
lender.occupational_info: Provide case management services to people with traumatic brain injury and older adults.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I'm still sussing this out, but I like the idea of directly helping people in poorer countries rather than just pouring money into a "charity". Hat tip Hulu.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a team that writes computer programs for businesses to use.

lender.name: Josh
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on microfinance and agriculture financing initiatives in Cambodia.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I want the world to better itself, and God helps those who help themselves!

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: To whom much has been given, much is expected ...
lender.occupational_info: Finance with multi-national corporation.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding to help an individual build a better life for him/her, a family, a village...the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write about the health and retirement benefits for employees in our company.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: when people build and sustain a business, they help not only themselves but their community. A little capital goes a long way.

lender.name: Rune
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people

lender.name: JT Moore
lender.loan_because: I'm learning to live loved and love others.
lender.occupational_info: I employ counseling, hypnosis and energy healing techniques to help people find peace and joy in their lives.

lender.name: Praveen
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It has so much more of an impact... I don't make much money, but here $25 only gets me one tank of gas. I lend $25 to someone who can make much better use of it, and eventually they pay me back and I can lend it out again. It's worth scrimping a bit to see some good come of it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teller at a bank. More money passes through my hands per day than I will earn in my entire life. The more of it I see, the more it just looks like stupid bits of paper that are wasted on nothing good. I'd rather see something real than collect bits of paper.

lender.name: Matty
lender.loan_because: I want to help when and where I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and I believe that I should help others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I manage technology at a The College of Saint Rose in Albany, NY.

lender.name: julia
lender.loan_because: It seems a direct and meaningful way to help.

lender.name: Connie Ragen
lender.loan_because: giving back to others throughout the world is the right thing to do - I am also a Rotarian
lender.occupational_info: I teach new entrepreneurs how to build an online empire, using online writing and technology to create a business on the internet

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a physical therapist.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can! Though I am a student without much money, I can do my best to help someone far away reach his or her goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student, graduating soon!

lender.name: JENNIFER
lender.loan_because:
I loan because I feel compelled to. What courage it takes to step out and say ... "This is what I want to do ... can you lend me some $ so I can get started."
I am self employed and in the early stages of my art career. I have no right to be throwing any money around on extras, like nice dinners and fancy clothes.
What I'd rather do ... What feeds my soul is using that $$ to help someone build their future.
You know what I mean ... get their business started. Like we are both doing it at the same time, just on different sides of the world.
That sounds way more rewarding then a new pair of earrings.
Heck! ... that can by 5 pigs in Cambodia!
lender.occupational_info:
I am an artist. Always have ... always will be. My "real" name had to have been Crayola in a past life.
I started my company BuTT UgLee back in 2001.
What the heck is a BuTT UgLee? Glad you asked ... I'll break this down plain and simple. I have characters that run around in my head. They all look lost, confused, worried, clueless, giddy, drunk, out of breath, in need of Psychiatric drugs or ... a big, big hug.
I create each character using muslin, stuffed with polyfill, painted with acrylics and dimensional paint. If I'm lucky I get to add funky wire, glitter, colored floss and/or an assortment of trim to create dimensional, whimsical and very unconventional wall art.
An UgLee is truly a piece of art. UgLees are not plush and not considered a toy. At first glance they do look like a stuffed animal. Soft and fluffy ... Not so!
Once the muslin is painted with acrylics the texture starts to change. It feels a bit firmer. Once all the layers of paint and the final sealer are added the muslin (that was once flimsey) feels more like canvas. This enables the UgLee to hang from the wall or lean on a shelf.
I like to call BuTT UgLee's unconventional, dimensional wall art. They are whimsical, wild, wacky, unique, hand crafted, original and one-of-a-kind designs.
I am simply amazed when I look at all of the places I have shipped my babies. I have a horse named Denzel in Victoria, Australia. I spider in Gremany. A chick and a spider in Singapore. Two primitive dolls in Middlesex, United Kingdom. Two angels Honolulu, Hawaii. My site and Blog have views from 74 different countries! Are you kidding me? AND ... Tons of super, loyal collectors in just about every state. I am humbled.

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore should :)

lender.name: Scott Leibrand
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the most promising way to spread prosperity and reduce poverty across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Ultimately my job is to make sure the Internet keeps working and growing.

lender.name: Stef
lender.loan_because: Money wants to flow.
lender.occupational_info: Living unconditional love.

lender.name: Zaccheus Mokua
lender.loan_because: I was born and grew up in Kenya, Africa and it is my aspiration to recognize those in poverty in 3rd world countries and assist them to flourish.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: You deserve to be abundant.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I own a business, and I understand how challenging it can be.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses solve their problems, by identifying solutions and assisting with implementation of those solutions.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can. :-)
lender.occupational_info: When groups come to our hotel for meetings and events, we consult them and provide them with the audio visual equipment (projectors, microphones, lighting, etc.) and services to make their event a success!

lender.name: Sarah and Brian
lender.loan_because: it's such an innovative way to make a tangible difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in non-profit anti-poverty organizations in our city.

lender.name: 2ndSkiesForex
lender.loan_because: I care about the world community. Since I was 10 years old, I wanted to help people all over the world. While my business keeps me busy, Kiva gives me an opportunity to help others in an integral way. I hope to improve others lives by helping them financially. May the quality of life for everyone increase.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to trade the Currency Markets (Forex) with the goal to help them increase their abundance. I also trade the markets to help increase my clients abundance - hopefully to be put to good use. This is the field I can create the most abundance in my life which I hope to pass on to others and make an impact in the world community.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with bank software which allows people to access their tax refunds quicker.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: "We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men." Herman Melville

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe it will help someone achieve goals they may have set before them. I would like to help someone in return for the help i received.
lender.occupational_info: Being a student is pretty universal.

lender.name: Niesha
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Gabrielle

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to the lives of those people who work hard toward financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I relish teaching children and youth to identify local plants, trees and flowers. I enjoy lending on Kiva.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: By and large I have what I need, so I can afford to make a small contribution that helps make a big difference in someone's life. I admire the people who put so much into what they do, and who have the drive and spirit to create a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Dan & Erin
lender.occupational_info:
Dan is returning to classroom teaching after three years managing the assessment of state examinations. He teaches English and Humanities.
Erin works in a business in the financial sector to help them improve their services and performance by helping them develop technology to suit the business' needs.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: i want to help people start earning their own money

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I would like to set an example for my kids that no matter how much or how little you have, you can help someone else.

lender.name: hasan
lender.loan_because: I would like to purchases a NIKON D60 Camera for my Profession
lender.occupational_info: I am Professional Photographer , I also operating MINI Lab Analog and Digital service, machine servicing, computer operating, computer printer servicing,

lender.name: Udo
lender.occupational_info: research into alternative energy, especially photovoltaics

lender.name: DAVID
lender.loan_because: ALL of the money and interest that is paid back from money I have loaned is sent back out as new loans to more people in those locations. You are helping each other.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance...
lender.occupational_info: I helped people resolve problems with their computer storage and networks. I developed macular degeneration (vision problems) and had to medically retire.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: there are people that have far less than I do. I also loan because the money goes to people who are helping themselves. Finally, I like micro finance because the money gets paid back to me and the same money can then be recirculated.
lender.occupational_info: I am a person who loves business and I like people who take action. It is important to dream big dreams! It is important to plan for anyone who fails to plan, plans to fail. However, it is most important to take action. A person who takes action even if they don't have a plan or a dream will still be farther ahead than the person who only dreams and plans.

lender.name: Mellow Monk's Green Teas
lender.loan_because: We promote family farms as a more Earth-friendly way of growing food.
lender.occupational_info: We sell authentic Japanese green tea, which we import directly from 100% family-owned and -operated green tea farms in Japan.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I believe that it's better to help someone who is helping themselves than to just give free items to those in need. This is a terrific program!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies hire people for all the jobs that need to be done in that company. I work mainly in high tech in the computer industry in California.

lender.name: Vijay
lender.loan_because: it's fun and it helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that specializes in audio for consumer electronics and film.

lender.loan_because: Im blessed enough to be able to

lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be able to pursue my goals if I hadn't received loans from others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a clinical psychologist.

lender.name: Zoonie
lender.occupation: I help to make applications for the Internet
lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in 'bottom of the pyramid' economics. I'm also a firm believer in localised businesses for local markets. Whilst I don't wholly dismiss globalisation as an economic force, small or vulnerable economies can protect themselves by growing as much specialised internal market business as possible. And now we can help. Yay!
lender.occupational_info: The internet is amazing because it can bring people together who can help each other, and can empower everyone in the process, reducing the power of govt to hide information or data from those who need it most- citizens. The work I do is to create opportunities for people to communicate online and on mobile phones, and hopefully feel they are more connected, and have more power than they did before!

lender.occupational_info: Fun, creative, beautiful, sexy, playful, Wisdom-based, Universal. We support personal evolution and living with purpose and passion

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people to start and develop productive and profitable businesses so that they can be financially independent.
lender.occupational_info:
Ellen R. Singer, a well-established management consultant, brings her expertise in clinical psychology and finance to BizBuilding, Inc., the ultimate resource for business professionals. Singer has extensive experience managing companies and starting new businesses. Her expertise in finance gives added value to the services she provides.
BizBuilding, Inc. is a New York-based management consulting practice that provides mid-sized companies with the expertise to compete more effectively. The company assists its clients by identifying the points between their business objectives, financial resources and quantifiable tactics that make the most effective use of available resources.
Specialties: Management Consulting Business and Marketing Plans Connection to Financing Resources Negotiations Leader Corporate Crisis Intervention Business Development and Referral Sourcing Workshops Business Coaching and Counseling
